create input: your links ░

have you ever wanted one of those pages that all the streamers, influencers, and onlyfans models use, but didn't really want to pay some greedy corporate service on a monthly basis, just to customize things, and ... have a background image?

look no further, you have stumbled into the linkgarden. at linkgarden, i am but one person, but i can make you the link page of your wildest dreams! your own customer colors, backgrounds, header images, avatars, gifs, featured images, videos, and even custom cursor animations. whatever you want (within reason). heck, i'll even create a neocities account for you, toss your page onto the server, and hand you the credentials.

of course, i could also setup a custom domain for you, but this is a bit more involved, and can be discussed if actually desired.

here are some examples i've setup in order to give you a basic idea of what i can do, for you:

(click each image to see a live example)

now you're probably wondering, "how much will this cost me tho? are you gonna charge me 15 dollars a month just to have this?" and the answer to that question would be, "no." in order to setup your link page, i charge a one-time flat fee of 20 dollars. since this'll take me about an hour, with the cost of living in mind, this is very reasonable. now, if this becomes more extensive, and you want more features than initially provided, we can negotiate.

one of the main reasons i'm doing this, is because, we've entered an era of the internet where every corporation is trying to suck you dry of every penny you have, and using the most annoying and vile ways to do it, as well. everything is a subscription, everything is tracking you, everything is an algorithm. it's exhausting, and the days of the nineties internet are all but lost, or are they?

take back your piece of the internet
